fields.value: Replication Data for: "Adoption of Distributed Solar across India"

dsDescriptionValue.value:
This package includes all datasets and codes (in R) to replicate all analyses and figures in "Adoption of Distributed Solar across India," a forthcoming article on Energy for Sustainable Development.

To cite the dataset: Aklin, Michaël; Cheng, Chao-yo; Urpelainen, Johannes. Replication Data for: "Adoption of Distributed Solar across India." 2017. Harvard Dataverse, V1. http://doi:10.7910/DVN/GITJQ4.

publicationCitation.value: Aklin, Michaël, Chao-Yo Cheng, and Johannes Urpelainen. 2017. "Geography, Community, Household: Adoption of Distributed Solar Power across India." Energy for Sustainable Development. Forthcoming.

files.description: The dataset for all regression analyses and figures that use village-level census data, including the adoption of solar power.
files.label: DataverseCensus.RData

dataFile.description: The dataset for all regression analyses and figures that use village-level census data, including the adoption of solar power.

files.description: The dataset for all regression analyses that use household-level survey data on energy access.  The full ACCESS dataset can be found at http://dx.doi.org/10.7910/DVN/0NV9LF.
files.label: DataverseSurvey.tab

dataFile.description: The dataset for all regression analyses that use household-level survey data on energy access.  The full ACCESS dataset can be found at http://dx.doi.org/10.7910/DVN/0NV9LF.

files.description: Read me for the replication package for the Energy for Sustainable Development article (forthcoming).
files.label: ReadMe.txt

dataFile.description: Read me for the replication package for the Energy for Sustainable Development article (forthcoming).

files.description: The GIS files for mapping the use of solar power in India.  Download the zip file and run "Maps" in Solar_Rep_Figure.R.
files.label: Solar_Maps.zip

dataFile.description: The GIS files for mapping the use of solar power in India.  Download the zip file and run "Maps" in Solar_Rep_Figure.R.

files.description: The .R file that replicates all village-level regression analyses in the paper and appendix (using DataverseCensus.RData).
files.label: Solar_Rep_Census.R

dataFile.description: The .R file that replicates all village-level regression analyses in the paper and appendix (using DataverseCensus.RData).

files.description: The .R file that replicates maps and figures in the paper and appendix (using DataverseCensus.RData).

files.description: The .R file that replicates all household-level regression analyses in the paper and appendix (using DataverseSurvey.RData).
